episodes.title: Inside Highschool Cult That Led To Burning Of Schools
episodes.description:
What started as a simple search for belonging quickly turned into a nightmare. I was introduced to a secret group in highschool that promised success, protection, and power. Little did I know, I was walking straight into a dangerous cult that would test my faith, loyalty, and even my life.

In this video, I reveal how I got recruited, the shocking rituals I witnessed, and the terrifying moment I realized I had to escape before it was too late.

If you've ever been curious about how cults operate, especially among students, this story will open your eyes and warn you about the hidden dangers that might be lurking in plain sight 
**#SchoolCult #TrueStory #CultsExposed #highschoolLife #SurvivorStory #DarkSecrets #DangerousCult

episodes.title: Inside Family Cult That Ruined My Life And That Of Our Dad
episodes.description:
When we lost our mother, our lives changed forever. Instead of finding healing, our father kept remarrying women who were cruel to us. One of them used witchcraft to manipulate my father and destroy our family. We lost love, protection, inheritance, and peace.
This is my true story of betrayal, spiritual manipulation, suffering, and survival. I share this testimony to expose the reality many children face in silence and to encourage anyone going through spiritual attacks, family rejection, or step-parent cruelty.
#Witchcraft
